data.text: As Bitcoinist starts to recap Bitcoin 2022's content, it's obvious that the focus on “crypto” over bitcoin was just a first-day thing. The Industry Day seems like a way to suck up to certain companies by giving them stage time, but without letting them interrupt the rest of the conference.

data.title: Podcast: Bitcoin 2022 — 'Tough Year Ahead,' Mining Myths, Which Country Will Adopt BTC Next?
data.text: We've also got interviews with Curve's CEO Shachar Bialick, and Bitcoin Magazine's managing director Christian Keroles.

data.title: Ripple price analysis: XRP continues decline past $0.78 support, is a breakout coming?
data.text: TL;DR Breakdown Ripple price analysis shows bearish signs coupled with a 4 percent decline in price Next upturn could rally up to $0.89 if price can consolidate above $0.81 demand […]
